/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars can be seen in the distance, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
